questions.question: Why is Romeo no longer interested in Rosaline in Act 2?

choices.answer: He did not see her at the party.
He is now bitter about love.
He is now in love with Juliet.
He forgot about her when Benvolio advised him to.

questions.question: What does Romeo decide to do at the start of Act 2, Scene 1?

choices.answer: Leave his friends and go home.
Go home with his friends.
Return to the Capulet's house to find Rosaline.
Return to the Capulet's house to find Juliet.

questions.question: At the beginning of Act 2, Scene 1, Benvolio asks Mercutio to do what?

choices.answer: Follow Romeo into the Capulet's orchard.
Mock Romeo to force him to come out of hiding.
Go back to the party to find Romeo.
Call for Romeo.

questions.question: 1. Mercutio attempts to "conjure" (make appear) Romeo by in Act 2, Scene 1 by doing what?

choices.answer: Saying they have Rosaline with them.
Threatening to reveal his presence to Tybalt.
Teasing him about Juliet.
Saying they have Juliet with them.

questions.question: At the end of Act 2, Scene 1, what do Benvolio and Mercutio decide to do?

choices.answer: Go back to the party to find Tybalt.
Go home without Romeo.
Follow Romeo to see what he is doing.
Go to Friar Lawrence's cell to ask his advice.

questions.question: In Romeo's opening speech in Act 2, Scene 2, he refers to Juliet as…

choices.answer: an Ethiopian princess.
the moon.
the sun.
the goddess Diana.

questions.question: Juliet's dialogue in Act 2, Scene 2 suggests Romeo's name alone…

choices.answer: Does not make him a good boyfriend.
Does not make him her enemy.
Means he must have been lying to her.
Proves he is an honorable man.

questions.question: Romeo claims he does not know what name he should identify himself by because…

choices.answer: his name is an enemy to Juliet, and therefore he hates it.
his name is an enemy to Juliet.
he cannot remember his name.
his name is hard to pronounce in Italian.

questions.question: Why does Juliet tell Romeo not to swear his love by the moon?

choices.answer: She cannot see the moon on cloudy nights.
The moon is always changing.
The moon is symbolically evil.
She thinks comparisons to the moon are corny.

questions.question: At the end of the Act 2, Scene 2, Romeo promises to…

choices.answer: meet Juliet at the friar's cell.
ask Lord Capulet if it is okay for him to marry Juliet.
send word to Juliet about when & where they will be married.
stay away from Tybalt.

questions.question: 1. In Act 2, Scene 3, the friar believes Romeo never went to bed because…

choices.answer: He thinks Romeo was with Rosaline all night.
He thinks Romeo was partying drunkenly with his friends.
He thinks Romeo was fighting with Tybalt.
He thinks Romeo was hiding from his father.

questions.question: In Act 2, Scene 3, Romeo confesses that he has come to see the friar because…

choices.answer: he wants to marry Juliet today.
he wants to make confession.
he wants to marry Rosaline today.
he wants to avoid going home.

questions.question: Romeo claims his love for Juliet is different from his love for Rosaline because…

choices.answer: Juliet is his enemy, while Rosaline was not.
Rosaline loves him back, while Juliet did not.
Juliet is rich, while Rosaline was poor.
Juliet loves him back, while Rosaline did not.

questions.question: Friar Lawrence agrees to marry Romeo to Juliet because he thinks it will…

choices.answer: end the fight between their families.
allow more marriages between their families.
cause more fighting among their families.
cause the Prince to lift the law against fighting.

questions.question: In Act 2, Scene 4, why are Benvolio and Mercutio talking about Tybalt?

choices.answer: Tybalt has challenged Benvolio.
Tybalt has challenged Mercutio.
Tybalt has challenged Paris.
Tybalt has challenged Romeo.

questions.question: When Romeo shows up in Act 2, Scene 4, he apologizes for…

choices.answer: leaving his friends behind the previous night.
spending so much time talking to the nurse.
leaving his friends at the dance so he could avoid Tybalt.
avoiding his friends all day.

questions.question: Who shows up to talk to Romeo in Act 2, Scene 4?

choices.answer: The friar.
The Nurse.
Tybalt.
Montague

questions.question: Mercutio asks Romeo to leave the nurse and do what?

choices.answer: Come to meet Tybalt's challenge.
Come to view other beauties.
Come to his father's house for dinner.
Come to the Capulet's party.

questions.question: 1. In Act 2, Scene 4, what does the nurse warn Romeo against?

choices.answer: Running into Tybalt.
Breaking Juliet's heart.
Marrying Juliet for her money.
Losing Capulet's blessing.

questions.question: Romeo arranges to send a man to the nurse with...

choices.answer: Money to escape to Mantua with him
Money to use as a bribe for the guards outside Juliet's room
Ropes to make a ladder to climb to Juliet's room
Ropes to tie up the guard so he can climb to Juliet's room

questions.question: What is Juliet waiting for at the start of Act 2, Scene 5?

choices.answer: For Peter to arrive with news of Romeo.
For the nurse to arrive with news of Romeo.
For Mercutio to arrive with news of Romeo.
For Romeo to arrive.

questions.question: When the nurse finally arrives at Juliet's room in Act 2, Scene 5, she claims…

choices.answer: She has only bad news.
She is too tired to talk.
She could not find Romeo.
She is too hungry to talk.

questions.question: In Act 2, Scene 5, the nurse says that Juliet's choice in Romeo is…

choices.answer: simple or foolish.
too hasty.
upsetting to her parents.
wise beyond her years.

questions.question: At the end of Act 2, Scene 5, the nurse finally reveals that Romeo will…

choices.answer: meet Juliet in the city square.
marry Juliet at the friar's cell that afternoon.
ask Capulet for Juliet's hand in marriage.
leave for Mantua immediately.

questions.question: What will be Juliet's excuse for leaving the house to go to church that afternoon?

choices.answer: She will say she is going to meet Paris.
She will say she is going to meet Tybalt.
She will say she is going to marry Romeo.
She will say she is going to confession.

questions.question: In Act 2, Scene 5, the nurse shares Romeo's plan to do what?

choices.answer: Answer Tybalt's challenge.
Marry Rosaline.
Climb into Juliet's room using a rope ladder.
Bribe the guards to let him in.

questions.question: Juliet meets Friar Lawrence and Romeo at the chapel so that Friar Lawrence can…

choices.answer: kill them.
marry them.
eat them.
feed them.
